items.title: OpenAI’s Nick Turley on transforming ChatGPT into an operating system
items.description: In an interview, OpenAI's Head of ChatGPT discusses the company's push into developing an AI operating system full of third-party apps.

items.title: Sora’s downloads in its first week was nearly as big as ChatGPT’s launch

items.title: Amazon Pharmacy is launching vending machines for prescription drugs
items.description: The kiosks have a range of commonly prescribed medications, including antibiotics, inhalers, and blood pressure medications.

items.title: Here’s the tech powering ICE’s deportation crackdown
items.description: From phone spyware and facial recognition to phone unlocking technology and databases and more, this tech powers Trump's deportation machine.
